Data Type + Length:
SELECT distinct
 [EmployerEmailTypeId]=c.id,
[EmployerEmailTypeName]  =c.name
  FROM [contact_type_contact_context] cc (nolock)
  inner Join contact_context c (nolock) on cc.contact_context_id = c.id
  Where 1=1
  and contact_type_id = 2
 and c.is_deleted=0
 and cc.is_deleted=0
 and c.party_type_id=3
